long_description: Most climbers focus on the weight of carabiners, quickdraws and cams, not their heavy chalk bag. Metolius decided to do something about that and created the cylindrical Ultralight Chalk Bag. Weighing only 50g, the Ultralight Chalk Bag is about half the weight of standard chalk bags. Made with lightweight outer fabrics and inner liner. Small loop holds a brush (not included) for cleaning off holds. The Metolius Ultralight Chalk Bag includes a webbing belt with side-release buckle.
short_description: Most climbers focus on the weight of carabiners, quickdraws and cams, not their heavy chalk bag. Metolius decided to do something about that and created the cylindrical Ultralight Chalk Bag.
